tasks.title: Project Planning and Setup
tasks.description: Conduct user interviews, define workflows, and set up AWS/Odoo environments.

subtasks.title: Conduct user interviews with target farms
Identify 5-7 representative California specialty crop farms
Prepare interview questions focused on workflows, pain points, and compliance
Schedule and conduct interviews (in-person/remote)
Summarize findings and extract key requirements
Map critical workflows and pain points
Document current manual and digital workflows for each farm
Identify bottlenecks and regulatory pain points
Create workflow diagrams for core processes (field, inventory, compliance, labor)
Develop data schema for core entities
Define entities: fields, crops, inventory, financials, compliance, labor, equipment
Design relational schema for Odoo ERP integration
Research Odoo core data model and ORM structure
Identify relevant Odoo modules (Inventory, Accounting, HR, Project, Field Service, IoT, Compliance)
Map farm management entities to Odoo models (fields, crops, inventory, financials, compliance, labor, equipment)
Document required customizations for each module (fields, relationships, workflows)
Design custom models for farm-specific entities not covered by Odoo core
Draft ER diagrams for all core and custom entities
Review schema with Odoo experts and farm stakeholders
Prototype schema in Odoo development environment
Test integration with Inventory, Accounting, HR, and Compliance modules
Iterate schema based on test results and feedback
Document final schema and adaptation steps for development team
Review schema with stakeholders for completeness
Set up AWS environment and CI/CD pipeline
Provision AWS Amplify, RDS, DynamoDB, S3, Lambda, IoT Core, SageMaker
Configure IAM roles and security policies
Set up CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment
Set up Odoo ERP base framework
Install and configure Odoo on AWS infrastructure
Create custom modules for farm management
Integrate Odoo authentication with AWS Cognito/Amplify
Create user authentication and role management
Define user roles (owner, manager, worker, buyer, regulator)
Implement authentication (iOS, web, Odoo)
Set up role-based access control for all modules

tasks.title: Field and Crop Management Module
tasks.description: Develop GIS-based field mapping, crop planning, and mobile data collection.

subtasks.title: Develop field mapping module with GIS integration
Select GIS library/SDK for iOS and web integration
Design UI for field boundary drawing and editing
Implement shapefile/GeoJSON import/export
Integrate with Odoo backend for field data storage
Build crop planning module with CA-specific templates
Develop crop template library for grapes, almonds, pistachios, berries, tomatoes
Implement crop rotation and historical yield tracking
Enable scheduling of crop-specific tasks and interventions
Create mobile data collection forms with offline capability
Design mobile-first UI for iOS (large touch targets, sunlight readable)
Implement SQLite/PWA offline data storage
Develop sync protocol for intermittent connectivity
Support photo, voice, and barcode data entry
Implement IoT data ingestion for sensors
Integrate with AWS IoT Core for sensor data
Develop data pipeline for soil moisture and irrigation sensors
Store and visualize sensor data in field dashboard
Integrate weather APIs
Select and integrate weather data provider (historical/forecast)
Display weather data in field and crop dashboards
Enable weather-triggered task scheduling (e.g., irrigation, spraying)

tasks.title: Inventory and Financial Management Module
tasks.description: Develop inventory tracking, purchase/sales order management, and financial dashboards.

subtasks.title: Develop inventory tracking system by crop/variety
Design inventory data model for Odoo integration
Implement real-time tracking by crop, variety, and quality
Enable storage location and buyer portal features
Build purchase and sales order management
Develop purchase order creation and approval workflow
Implement sales order management and buyer notifications
Integrate with Stripe for payment processing
Create sales portal for buyers
Design buyer-facing UI for inventory visibility
Enable order placement and status tracking
Implement secure buyer authentication and permissions
Implement Stripe integration for payments
Set up Stripe account and API keys
Integrate Stripe with Odoo and sales portal
Test payment flows and error handling
Design financial reporting dashboard
Define key financial metrics (P&L by field/crop, cost tracking)
Develop dashboard UI for real-time reporting
Enable export of financial reports for compliance and benchmarking

tasks.title: Compliance and Labor Management Module
tasks.description: Build compliance reporting, labor management, and document management features.

subtasks.title: Build compliance reporting modules for water, fertilizer, pesticides
Document California compliance requirements (SGMA, ILRP, PUR, SWRCB, CCOF, FSMA)
Design compliance data models for each reporting area
Implement automated data capture from field and inventory modules
Develop report generation and electronic submission features
Integrate with CalAgPermits, water boards, and other regulatory APIs
Develop labor management system with scheduling and compliance tracking
Design labor data model (worker, schedule, compliance docs)
Implement worker scheduling and time tracking UI
Enable compliance documentation (training, safety, H-2A)
Develop productivity and cost reporting dashboards
Implement document management for regulatory submissions
Design secure document storage and access controls
Enable upload and tagging of compliance documents
Implement audit log for document access and changes
Create notifications for compliance deadlines
Define compliance deadlines for all reporting areas
Implement notification system (email, SMS, in-app)
Enable user-configurable reminders and escalation
Design dashboard for labor productivity metrics
Define key labor metrics (hours, cost, productivity)
Develop dashboard UI for real-time labor reporting
Enable export of labor reports for compliance and benchmarking

tasks.title: Equipment Integration and IoT Module
tasks.description: Integrate with equipment APIs, build telemetry dashboards, and add maintenance tracking.

subtasks.title: Integrate with John Deere and Trimble APIs
Document equipment inventory and connectivity options
Develop multi-protocol gateway for equipment data
Implement direct API integration for supported equipment
Develop hardware bridge for legacy equipment
Build telemetry dashboards for equipment monitoring
Design equipment telemetry data model
Develop real-time dashboard UI for equipment status
Enable alerting for equipment faults and maintenance needs
Add fuel and maintenance tracking
Implement fuel usage logging and reporting
Develop maintenance scheduling and history tracking
Integrate with equipment vendor APIs for parts and service
Begin beta testing with target farms
Select 2-3 pilot farms for beta testing
Deploy equipment integration modules to pilot farms
Collect feedback on usability and integration gaps
Collect feedback and implement changes
Summarize beta feedback and prioritize changes
Implement high-priority fixes and improvements
Prepare for full-scale launch

tasks.title: Urth Agriculture and Final Launch
tasks.description: Integrate Urth Agriculture catalog, refine UI, and launch MVP.

subtasks.title: Integrate Urth Agriculture product catalog
Obtain Urth Agriculture product API/documentation
Develop integration for product catalog and application scheduling
Enable results tracking (BRIX, etc.) and reorder management
Implement order management for inputs/services
Design order management UI for inputs and services
Integrate with inventory and financial modules
Test order workflows end-to-end
Refine user interface based on feedback
Collect UI/UX feedback from pilot users
Prioritize and implement UI improvements
Conduct usability testing for critical workflows
Develop training materials and knowledge base
Document all core workflows and modules
Create video and written tutorials for onboarding
Build searchable knowledge base for support
Launch MVP with pilot farms
Select 5 pilot farms across diverse crops
Deploy MVP and monitor usage
Collect post-launch feedback and plan next phase
